page.title: 06GT.YARNMOUTH - STADIUM
page.content: THE GT.YARMOUTH STADIUM To every meeting there are 8 races. There have been about 5000 races since they first opened. George Formby used to be interested in Speedway so is Lady Somerleyton and Charlie Chester. The East Anglian Derby,held for 38 years, has a visiting celebrity such as Billy Moore, Henry Cooper and Geoff Boycott. Stock Car Racing has the most people attend as it is more a family affair than greyhound racing. In 1974 a new stadium was built with fireproof materials. The older stadium contained timber. Probably, a wise precaution in view of the recent fire disaster at the Bradford City Football ground.
